name: marko-vite-example
description: Sample app that demonstrates the power of building UI components using Marko and Vite

scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:client: npm run env NODE_ENV=production -- vite build
scripts.build:server: npm run env NODE_ENV=production -- vite build --ssr src/index.js
scripts.start: npm run env NODE_ENV=production -- node --enable-source-maps index.js
